devdoc.details: This contract holds most of the logic witten for MTG on the blockchain.

attackWithCreature(uint256,uint256,uint2.details: A function that allows a plainswalker to command one of it's creatures to attack another plainswalker

changeName(uint256,string).details: change the name of a plainsWalker if you own it.

collectManaFromLands(uint256,uint256).details: A function that intefaces with the land contract and collects mana from the land.

createRandomPlainsWalker(string).details: External function to create a persons first plainsWalker

getCreatureInfoByIndex(uint256).details: A getter function for creature info.

getPlainsWalkerFee().details: A function to tell users how much a plainsWalker costs

getPlainswalkerInfoById(uint256).details: Get information on a plainsWalker through its id.

returns._0: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

purchasePlainsWalker(string).details: A function to purchase another plainswalker

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

revivePlainsWalker(uint256).details: A function that revives a plainsWalker after it has died.

setCreatureToAttack(uint256,uint256).details: Sets a creature to be able to attack

setLandContractAddress(address).details: A function so the owner of the contract can set the address of the land contract.

setPlainsWalkerFee(uint256).details: A function to set how much a plainsWalker costs

summonCreature(uint256,uint16,uint16,uin.details: A function that summons a creature with by spending mana and assocciates the id of the creature with the   plainsWalker that summoned it.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
